Container.Name: Don Melton's Video Transcoding scripts
Container.Description: These are the awesome video transcoding scripts by Don Melton (https://github.com/donmelton/video_transcoding). The docker container is maintained by ntodd (https://hub.docker.com/r/ntodd/video-transcoding/). All credits where due. Please note that the scripts must be used from the commandline. No GUI / Webserver is provided. To run the script, ssh in and execute $ docker run -itv "`pwd`":/data ntodd/video-transcoding.
